_comment: RITA PDF Extractor - Google Sheets Configuration Template
_instructions: 1. Create a Google Cloud Project: https://console.cloud.google.com/
2. Enable 'Google Sheets API' and 'Google Drive API'
3. Create a Service Account and download the JSON key file
4. Rename the key file to 'google_credentials.json' and place it in this folder
5. Share your Google Sheet with the service account email (found in the key file)
6. Copy your Google Sheet ID from the URL and paste it below
Copy the SPREADSHEET_ID part and paste below
